change.changenote: Section 11.1 was enacted by BC Reg 248/2022, effective February 1, 2023.
Section 11.2 was enacted by BC Reg 248/2022, effective February 1, 2023.
Section 12 before re-enacted by BC Reg 175/2015, effective September 22, 2015.

bcl:section.bcl:marginalnote: Confirming a common or integrated program or activity
bcl:section.bcl:text: The written documentation that confirms that a program or activity is a common or integrated program or activity is a written agreement that

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: is signed by the head of each public body and agency through which, or on whose behalf, as applicable, the services of the program or activity are provided, and

bcl:subparagraph.bcl:text: a description of the services provided by the program or activity;
a description of the types of personal information collected, used and disclosed in the course of providing the program or activity;
a description of the purposes, key objectives and expected benefits or outcomes of the program or activity;
a description of the respective roles and responsibilities of each public body and agency through which, or on whose behalf, the services are provided;
the date on which the program or activity will start and, if applicable, the date on which the program or activity will end.

change.changenote: Section 13 was renumbered as 13 (1) by BC Reg 298/2021, effective November 26, 2021.
Section 13 (2) was added by BC Reg 298/2021, effective November 26, 2021.
Section 15 BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 297/2021, effective November 26, 2021.

bcl:section.bcl:text: The social media sites prescribed for the purposes of the definition of "social media site" in Schedule 1 of the Act are set out in Schedule 3 of this regulation.

change.changenote: Schedule 3 BEFORE re-enacted by BC Reg 123/2014, effective June 23, 2014.
